title: 93/484/EEC: Commission Decision of 27 August 1993 adopting the plan allocating to the Member States resources to be charged to the 1994 budget year for the supply of food from intervention stocks for the benefit of the most deprived persons in the Community
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 27 August 1993 adopting the plan allocating to the Member States resources to be charged to the 1994 budget year for the supply of food from intervention stocks for the benefit of the most deprived persons in the Community
(93/484/EEC)THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The plan referred to in Article 2 (1) of Regulation (EEC) No 3149/92 for the 1994 budget year is adopted as set out in the following Articles:

Subject to a limit of ECU 2 422 000, the following quantities of produce may be withdrawn from intervention for distribution in Belgium:
- 3 000 tonnes of common wheat,
- 300 tonnes of milk powder,
- 200 tonnes of butter,
- 600 tonnes of beef.

Subject to a limit of ECU 2 000 000, the following quantities of produce may be withdrawn from intervention for distribution in Denmark:
- 50 tonnes of butter,
- 250 tonnes of beef.

Subject to a limit of ECU 12 000 000, the following quantities of produce may be withdrawn from intervention for distribution in Greece:
- 4 000 tonnes of beef.

Subject to a limit of ECU 35 400 000, the following quantities of produce may be withdrawn from intervention for distribution in Spain:
- 30 000 tonnes of durum wheat,
- 5 000 tonnes of butter,
- 6 000 tonnes of beef,
- 4 000 tonnes of olive oil.

Subject to a limit of ECU 28 560 000, the following quantities of produce may be withdrawn from intervention for distribution in France:
- 5 000 tonnes of common wheat,
- 8 000 tonnes of durum wheat,
- 1 500 tonnes of butter,
- 5 000 tonnes of beef,
- 2 000 tonnes of rice,
- 6 000 tonnes of milk powder.

Subject to a limit of ECU 4 600 000 the following quantitities of produce may be withdrawn from intervention for distribution in Ireland:
- 40 tonnes of butter,
- 1 450 tonnes of beef.

Subject to a limit of ECU 24 500 000, the following quantities of produce may be withdrawn from intervention for distribution in Italy:
- 5 000 tonnes of common wheat,
- 10 000 tonnes of durum wheat,
- 1 500 tonnes of rice,
- 1 300 tonnes of butter,
- 7 000 tonnes of beef,
- 2 000 tonnes of olive oil,
- 1 000 tonnes of cheese (Grana Padano),
- 1 000 tonnes of cheese (Parmigiano Reggiano).

Subject to a limit of ECU 78 000, the following quantities of produce may be withdrawn from intervention for distribution in Luxembourg:
- 20 tonnes of common wheat,
- 25 tonnes of milk powder,
- 15 tonnes of butter,
- 15 tonnes of beef.

0
Subject to a limit of ECU 3 000 000, the following quantities of produce may be withdrawn from intervention for distribution in the Netherlands:
- 150 tonnes of butter,
- 600 tonnes of beef.

1
Subject to a limit of ECU 10 440 000, the following quantities of produce may be withdrawn from intervention for distribution in Portugal:
- 1 850 tonnes of common wheat,
- 1 850 tonnes of durum wheat,
- 1 200 tonnes of rice,
- 1 200 tonnes of butter,
- 2 500 tonnes of beef,
- 1 000 tonnes of olive oil,
- 1 000 tonnes of milk powder.

2
Subject to a limit of ECU 25 000 000, the following quantities of produce may be withdrawn, from intervention, for distribution in the United Kingdom:
- 6 000 tonnes of beef.

3
ECU 2 million are reserved to cover the costs of intra-Community transport referred to in Article 2 (3) of Regulation (EEC) No 3149/92.

4
All amounts in ecus shall be converted into national currencies at the rates applicable on 1 October 1993 and published in the Official Journal of the European Communities, C series.

5
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 27 August 1993.
For the Commission
RenĂŠ STEICHEN
Member of the Commission
